alert.note: Alert for Upper San Pedro River Valley including Sierra Vista, Benson (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 12:29PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Cochise County through 100 PM MST... At 1228 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Tombstone, or 16 miles northeast of Sierra Vista, moving northwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tombstone and Fairbank. This includes the following highways... Route 80 between mile markers 311 and 325. Route 82 between mile markers 59 and 67. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Upper San Pedro River Valley including Sierra Vista, Benson
